Name: Black Mesa
Ingredients: 45 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
15 ml Jamaican-style overproof aged pot still rum
15 ml Lustau San Emilio Pedro Ximénez Sherry
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
EXPRESS flamed orange zest twist over cocktail, then use as garnish.
Review: Pungent, funky and boozy with harmonious rum-dominated bitter sweetness.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2015 by Damon Boelte at Grand Army, Brooklyn, New York, USA. Damon's original recipe called for El Dorado 12 year old Demerara rum and Smith & Cross Jamaican rum.
Nutrition: One serving of Black Mesa contains 191 calories
